source:
raw_storage_container = 'abfss://odw-raw@' + storage_account
raw_storage_source_folder = 'employee-syn'
raw_storage_source_name = 'employee-syn-delta.csv'
workspace_storage_container = 'abfss://odw-workspace@' + storage_account
workspace_storage_temp_folder = 'employee-syn'
workspace_storage_temp_name = 'employee-syn'
curated_storage_container = 'abfss://odw-curated@' + storage_account
curated_storage_delta_folder = 'employee-syn'
curated_storage_delta_table_name = 'employee-syn'
delta_lake_table_key_column = 'Pers_No'
delta_lake_table_name = "employee_syn"
sourceColumnNames = 'Profession,Pers_No,Employee_Number,First_Name,Last_Name,PA,Personnel_Area,Personnel_SubArea,PSubArea,Org_unit,Organizational_Unit,Organizational_Key,Organizational_Key1,WorkC,Work_Contract,CT,Contract_Type,PS_Group,Pay_Band_Description,FTE,Wk_Hrs,Work_Schedule,Is_Part_Time,S,Employment_Status,Gender_Key,TRA_Start_Date,TRA_End_Date,TRA_Status,TRA_Grade,Prev_PersNo,ActR,Reason_For_Action,Position,Position1,Cost_Ctr,Cost_Centre,Civil_Service_Start,Date_To_Current_Job,Seniority_Date,Date_To_Subst_Grade,Pers_No_1,Name_of_Manager,Manager_Position,Manager_Position_Text,Counter_Sign_Manager,Loc,Location,Org_Start_Date,Fix_Term_End_Date,Loan_Start_Date,Loan_End_Date,EEGrp,Employee_Group,Annual_salary,Curr,NI_number,Birth_date,Age_of_employee,EO,Rel,Religious_Denomination_Key,SxO,Ethnic_origin,Disability_Code,Disability_Text,Disability_Code_Description,NID,Wage_Type,Employee_Subgroup,LOA_Abs_Type,LOA_Absence_Type_Text,Scheme_reference,Pension_Scheme_Name,PArea,Payroll_Area,Assignment_Number,Company_Code,CoCd,Email_Address,Address_Line_1,Address_Line_2,Town,County,Postcode,Phone_Number,Annual_Leave_Start,Active_Status,Is_Charting_Officer,Charting_Officer_ID,Grade,Is_Sub_Group_Leader,Is_APO,Is_APOM,FTE_Primary,FTE_Secondary,Location_Primary,Location_Secondary,Leaving_Date,Attribute10'

from pyspark.sql.types import *

raw_storage_folder_path = raw_storage_container   + '/' + raw_storage_source_folder + '/' + raw_storage_source_name
workspace_storage_folder_path = workspace_storage_container + '/' + workspace_storage_temp_folder + '/' + workspace_storage_temp_name


sourceColumnNamesList = sourceColumnNames.split (",")
sourceStructString = StructType()
for sourceColumn in sourceColumnNamesList:
    sourceStructString.add(StructField(sourceColumn ,StringType(), True))


rawsourceDF=spark.read.option("delimiter", ",").option("header", "true").schema(sourceStructString).csv(raw_storage_folder_path)

rawsourceDF.write.option("header", "true").format('parquet').mode('overwrite').save(workspace_storage_folder_path)

from pyspark.sql.types import *
from pyspark.sql.functions import *

curated_storage_delta_table_path = curated_storage_container + '/' + curated_storage_delta_folder + '/' + curated_storage_delta_table_name

sourceParquetDF = spark.read.option("inferSchema","true").format('parquet').option("recursiveFileLookup", "true").load(workspace_storage_folder_path)

serviceDF=sourceParquetDF.select(to_json(struct("*")).alias("Body"),struct(col("Pers_No").alias("CorrelationId"),concat(col("Pers_No"),lit("-"),regexp_replace(current_timestamp(),"[^\d]","-")).alias("MessageID"),lit("1").alias("PartitionKey")).alias("BrokerProperties"))

display(serviceDF)
#serviceDF.printSchema()

serviceDF.write.format('json').option("maxRecordsPerFile", 100).mode('overwrite').save(workspace_storage_folder_path + '.json')

# Import modules
from delta.tables import DeltaTable

curated_storage_delta_table_path = curated_storage_container + '/' + curated_storage_delta_folder + '/' + curated_storage_delta_table_name
# Get all versions
delta_table = DeltaTable.forPath(spark, curated_storage_delta_table_path)
display(delta_table.history())
